onboarding.Slide1.translation:
This Cozmo has already been through the Tutorial.
 Would you like to skip it or start again?

onboarding.Slide2.translation: Cozmo is a very special robot and needs a special owner. Follow the instructions carefully! Are you ready to begin?

onboarding.Slide4.translation: Just like you, if it's too close, it's hard to see.

onboarding.Phase3.Header1.translation: Place a cube in front of Cozmo

onboarding.Phase3.Body1.translation: It will turn <color=cyan>blue</color> when he can see it

onboarding.Phase3.Body2.translation: Great! Just like you, if it's too close, It's hard to see

onboarding.Phase3.Header3.translation: He'll tell you when he's ready to proceed...

onboarding.Phase3.Body3.translation: Let Cozmo inspect the cube on his own

onboarding.Phase3.Body4.translation:
Well done!
Cozmo is ready to play!

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorCube2.translation: Put the Cube in front of Cozmo to proceed

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorCubeRightSideUp2.translation: Turn the Cube so that the lights are on top

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorCozmo.translation: Tutorial Paused Cozmo needs to be on a stable, flat, surface and to explore on his own.

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorFinal.translation: Having Trouble? Make sure Cozmo is on a flat, clean table. Cozmo may struggle on glass surfaces. If you're still having issues, visit support.anki.com on another device.

onboarding.Phase4.Body1a.translation: As you play with Cozmo, you'll charge his emotion chip

onboarding.Phase4.Body1b.translation: This chip is what makes him special, and alive

onboarding.Phase4.Body2a.translation: When the chip is fully charged,

onboarding.Phase4.Body3sparks.translation: Use <color=#11a2f0ff>sparks</color> to get Cozmo to perform

onboarding.Phase4.Body4.translation: These are Cozmo's Upgrades. Use your <color=#ffcc00ff>BITS</color> to Upgrade Stack Cubes.

onboarding.Phase5.Body1.translation:
It's time to play some games!

Tap the Play tab, here.

onboarding.Phase5.Body2.translation:
Here's what to do next for Today.


This is the quickest way to upgrade Cozmo!

onboarding.Phase5.Body3.translation:
These are Cozmo Apps. Your first goal is to use Meet Cozmo.
Try it now!

onboarding.Slide0a.translation: Put Cozmo on a clean, open table in a well lit room

onboarding.OldRobotSkip.translation: This Cozmo has already been through the Tutorial. Would you like to Skip it, or Start it again?
